H0.text: Who is recognised as Britain’s first Prime Minister. Sir Robert Walpole

H1.text: Who is recognised as Britain’s first Prime Minister. Winston Churchill

H2.text: Who is recognised as Britain’s first Prime Minister. Lord North

H3.text: Who is recognised as Britain’s first Prime Minister. Bob Booty

A4.text: Robert Walpole, 1st Earl of Orford, is generally regarded as the de facto first Prime Minister of Great Britain, serving from 1721 to 1742.

A5.text: His de facto tenure as 'prime minister' is often dated to his appointment as First Lord of the Treasury in 1721.
